biotools.summary: SPOT-Disorder is a method used for predicting disordered regions in proteins. Initial studies indicate that the method is more accurate in predicting functional sites in disordered regions.

bioschemas.name: SPOT-Disorder
bioschemas.summary: SPOT-Disorder is a method used for predicting disordered regions in proteins. Initial studies indicate that the method is more accurate in predicting functional sites in disordered regions.
